title: I Cannot use the new Client PLEASE HELP
body:
I have been playing for 2 and a half years now and I love the game. This new client has ruined all of that though. While in the champion selection phase I cannot Choose masteries, ban a champion, pick a champion or change runes but most of the time I can declare a champion. My problem is that my screen is behind everyone else's e.g. (someone will be banning and i can see that but what i cant see is it is actually my time to ban/pick) but do note that i can get into game sometimes if i just click random places but that is not how i want to play league. Also note that once i get in-game there is nothing wrong at all the game runs smoothly which the client does not.

I just wanna say thanks to riot for giving me this 30 min ban because I did not lock in a champion..... They gave me the time to write this.

If anyone has and ideas on how I could make the **CLIENT** run smoother please tell me i have spent alot of money on the game and I am not ready for that to go waste.

Things i have tried
-Hextech Repair Tool (made by riot but probably not for alpha client)
-Troubleshooting in client
-Turning off all animations for the client
-Changing the client to high priority in the task manager
-Razer Cortex
-Running the client with nothing else running 
-Updating Drivers
-Changing compatibility
-Running as Administrator

And I do know about going beak to the legacy client but when ever i try i get a "Kernel Patch Error" and then league of legends closes its self.
